Freeze

Freeze.

Freeze
Freeze
Freeze
PdFreeze.freeze();
SnFreeze.unFreeze();

Freeze Section

Freeze
Section Freeze
Freeze
PdFreeze.freeze({ selector: "#freezeSection" });
SnFreeze.unFreeze("#freezeSection");

API

freeze

Property Description Type Default
selector Id html element selector string body
text text content string -

unFreeze

Property Description Type Default
selector Id html element selector string body
